pcd.utils

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcd.utils.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends Object
    Author:
    Tibor Sloboda Various utilities for manipulating files, loading and saving, as well as creating zip files and CSVs.

    • Method Detail

      • updateRGB

        public static void updateRGB(String CONFIG_PATH,
                             int i,
                             String hexColor)
                      throws IOException
        Utility for writing RGB values to the config
        Parameters:
        CONFIG_PATH - The path to the config
        i - Line index
        hexColor - The string containing the RGB string formated as ffffff.rgb
        Throws:
        IOException - When file writing fails

      • prepCache

        public static boolean prepCache()
        Deprecated. This is no longer necessary in the newer versions
        Creates the cache folder
        Returns:
        true if succeeded

      • isComment

        public static boolean isComment(String line)
        Check if line in config is a comment
        Parameters:
        line - The line to check
        Returns:
        true if comment

      • readConfigFile

        public static ArrayList<String> readConfigFile(String path)
                                        throws IOException
        Reads the contents of the config file and adds them to an array if they aren't comment lines.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the config
        Returns:
        An array of non-comment non-empty lines
        Throws:
        IOException - if file fails to read

      • loadImageFile

        public static boolean loadImageFile(File f,
                                    DefaultTableModel t,
                                    ImageDataStorage stor)
        Checks an image file's name adds it to the file list table, and adds respective image data objects.
        Parameters:
        f - the path to the image
        t - the table to add the image entry to
        stor - image data storage to add the image object to
        Returns:
        true if succeeded

      • checkConfigFile

        public static boolean checkConfigFile(String path)
        Checks if config exits, and if not, writes it
        Parameters:
        path - path to config
        Returns:
        true if success

      • saveCSVSingle

        public static void saveCSVSingle(Path savePath,
                                 ArrayList<AtomicInteger> counts,
                                 ArrayList<String> typeConfigList)
                          throws IOException
        Saves a summary for the opened image data into a CSV
        Parameters:
        savePath - the file to save to
        counts - counted types of cilia
        typeConfigList - the cilia type names
        Throws:
        IOException - if writing fails

      • saveProject

        public static void saveProject(Path savePath,
                               List<ImageDataObject> imgObjectList)
        Saves the project file which includes image paths, all points and their data, and some metrics.
        Parameters:
        savePath - the path to save to
        imgObjectList - the list of image data objects to save

      • loadProject

        public static ArrayList<ImageDataObject> loadProject(File file)
        Loads the project from the XML and loads it into the software, replacing the currently open project.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load from
        Returns:
        the loaded image data objects as an array

      • saveCacheAll

        public static void saveCacheAll(ArrayList<ImageDataObject> imgs,
                                String path)
                         throws IOException
        Saves annotations for all points, consisting of coordinates and class.
        Parameters:
        imgs - the image data objects to save
        path - the path to the file to save to
        Throws:
        IOException - if writing fails

      • getCSVSaveLocation

        public static Path getCSVSaveLocation(MainFrame parentFrame)
        A file chooser dialog to get save path for CSV file
        Parameters:
        parentFrame - the parent frame to use as modal
        Returns:
        the path to the file

      • saveCSVMultiple

        public static void saveCSVMultiple(Path csvSaveLocation,
                                   ImageDataStorage imageStore)
                            throws IOException
        Saves a summary for the opened image data into a CSV
        Parameters:
        csvSaveLocation - the file path to save to
        imageStore - the image data objects to save data from
        Throws:
        IOException - if writing fails
